introduction:
Hey there, I'm Leonel, the south of Argentina!
I'm an aspiring React Front-End Developer, passionate about technology for as long as I can remember.
At the end of September of 2022, I completed a React Front-End bootcamp, and since then I've been learning and doing projects on my own.
My goal is to become a developer, building interactive websites that bring value through my work while leveling my skills as a developer.
I have studied English for 7 years, graduating with a B2 'upper intermediate' level through the Cambridge FCE Examination. I use English in my day to day, from listening to music, watching movies, tv series to learning. If I can consume it in English, I do it
